name: Azure Security Center contact phone number not set
description: This policy identifies Azure Security Center contact phone number is empty. It is recommended to update Azure Security Center phone number to receive notifications when Azure Security Center detects compromised resources
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'azure' AND api.name = 'azure-security-center-settings' AND json.rule = 'securityContacts is empty or securityContacts[?any(properties.phone is empty)] exists'
recommendation:
Use below Azure CLI example command to create new contact with phone number details for Azure Security Center,

az security contact create -n "default1" --email 'john@contoso.com' --phone '214275-4038' --alert-notifications 'on' --alerts-admins 'on'

For more information:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cli/azure/security/contact?view=azure-cli-latest
